text:
involved isolating individuals from their environment, removing all stimuli,

and then exposing them to specific sounds or visuals to manipulate their

perception and behavior. Many participants were subjected to prolonged

periods of sensory deprivation, which led to severe psychological trauma.

   • Esther Cohen: A Canadian woman who was subjected to MKUltra's

    sensory deprivation experiments in the 1950s. Her experiences were

    documented in a book titled "The Mind Manipulators."
